title: Bug 14113: Does not listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: The current behavior of the software is that it does not listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas. This bug report is to address this issue and fix the software so that it properly responds to these java deltas.
OB: Currently, the software does not refresh the class file editor when FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas occur.
EB: To resolve this issue, the software should refresh the class file editor to display the updated source when FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas occur.
SR: Implement a fix that ensures the class file editor is refreshed when FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas are detected.
